meanings.sent1: She quickly understood the math problem.
meanings.sent2: I finally understood the instructions after reading them a few times.
meanings.sent3: The cat understood that the laser pointer was a fun toy.
meanings.sent4: His silence understood more than any words could express.
meanings.sent5: The concept finally clicked, and I understood it completely.

meanings.definition: Accepted as true or valid without further explanation.
meanings.sent1: The understood fact was that the sun rises in the east.
meanings.sent2: It is an understood rule that you must wear a helmet while biking.
meanings.sent3: The understood agreement was that everyone would bring a dish to the potluck.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an understood signal that everything was okay.
meanings.sent5: The understood tradition was to exchange gifts on Christmas Eve.

meanings.sent1: The understood meaning behind his words was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent2: It was understood that she would always be there for her friends.
meanings.sent3: The understood consequence of not studying was failing the test.
meanings.sent4: The understood hierarchy in the office made promotions predictable.
meanings.sent5: The understood danger of the situation made everyone cautious.
